description: This particle describes the chemical composition of various lipid particles. See also [https://www.wikipathways.org/index.php/Pathway:WP430] for a basic overview of cholesterol synthesis, and for the disease related to the lipoproteins in this pathway see [https://www.wikipathways.org/index.php/Pathway:WP4522].  Additional sources - A. Goldberg, Overview of Lipid Metabolism, 2015. http://www.msdmanuals.com/professional/endocrine-and-metabolic-disorders/lipid-disorders/overview-of-lipid-metabolism
title: Lipid particles composition
